item.title: 22 Oct 2017 23:00
item.description:
One world by night. NJ trip to meet Suresh and Ramu Anna fly. Bad traffic on the way back. Chances upon the scenic #Palisades trail head by the Hudson. Absolutely worth the detour!#NJ #weekend
